pages.text: $(li)These passive creatures can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/maple_forest)Maple Forests$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can attract them holding a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/red_mushroom)Red Mushroom$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brown_mushroom)Brown Mushroom$(/l) in your hand.$(br)$(li)If you give a Snail one of them, it will place on the ground Snail Slime. If you broke this block, you will obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/snail_slime)Snail Slime$(/l).
Snails are a little shy, when we are close to them, they will hide under their shells, gaining +20 resistance.
$(li)You can bred Snails give them Mushroom Stews.$(br)$(li)When a Baby Snail grows up to ab Adult Snail, it drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/snail_shell_piece)Snail Shell Piece$(/l).
